title: Bracelets, mid-19th century
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Gustav E. Kissel
description:
A) Bracelet composed of a flat band of brown hair with gold clasp marked: "H. L. Thorn".
B) Bracelet composed of a flat band of brown hair with gold clasp marked "E. A. Thorn".

tombstone.epitaph:
Bracelets, mid-19th century.
mid-19th century. Hair, gold. Gift of Mrs. Gustav E. Kissel. 1928-5-56-a,b.
